faq.headline: Wondering How We Work?
faq.description: Answers to common questions about our process, services, and how we work.

items.question: What kind of clients do you work with?
items.answer: We work with a diverse range of clients including startups, established brands, creative agencies, and individual entrepreneurs. Whether you're launching a new product or refreshing an existing brand, we're here to help bring your vision to life.

items.question: What services do you offer?
items.answer: Our services include brand identity design, web design and development, photography, video production, and creative direction. We offer both comprehensive packages and individual services tailored to your specific needs.

items.question: How do you price your projects?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing options including project-based fees and monthly retainers. After understanding your needs during our initial consultation, we provide a detailed proposal with transparent pricing. No hidden fees, ever.

items.question: What is your typical project timeline?
items.answer: Timelines vary based on project scope. A brand identity project typically takes 4-6 weeks, while a complete website can take 6-10 weeks. We'll provide a detailed timeline during our kickoff meeting and keep you updated throughout the process.

items.question: Can we collaborate remotely?
items.answer: Absolutely! We work with clients globally and have refined our remote collaboration process. We use modern tools for communication, file sharing, and project management to ensure seamless collaboration regardless of location.

items.question: Do you accept one-off design tasks or only full projects?
items.answer: We accept both! While we love comprehensive projects, we understand that sometimes you need quick design support. Our monthly retainer plans are perfect for ongoing design needs, and we also take on smaller, focused projects.

items.question: How many concepts or revisions are included?
items.answer: Our standard packages include 2-3 initial concepts and 2 rounds of revisions. We find this provides enough creative exploration while keeping projects focused. Additional revisions can be arranged if needed.

description.text: Whether you're building a brand, designing a product, or simply want to explore an idea,
description.highlight: we'd love to hear from you.

newsletter.title: Sign up for our monthly newsletter.
